analysis.description:
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x7638a5f444eab0281ca1abff2c8029cbb806a566.sol#28-29)
XOXOCoin._Rate should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x7638a5f444eab0281ca1abff2c8029cbb806a566.sol#65)
